name: Charlie Agility
description:
Charlie is your small ball shaped robot pet, and you are in a robot agility competition with him. He needs to step on colored platforms in a correct order as fast as possible while you're cheering for him.

The game requires PC, Sphero 2, Makey Makey, physical flat platforms that act as buttons and are connected to Makey Makey, and a smart phone for controlling Sphero (find the official app).
